companyInfo.Competitors: Integrity Staffing Solutions, Adecco, Kelly Services

jobDescription: Job Description: Seeking a Data Science Analyst with distinctive analytical and problem-solving skills to develop a deep understanding of our process improvement. This role will collaborate with team members responsible for analyzing operation performance, uncovering cost, quality and scalability which leads planning to improve customer experience and reduce cost. Qualifications:Advanced experience with: ? Database query, SQL  ? Spreadsheets (Google/Excel) and analysis experience  ? Data analytical skills combined with impeccable business judgment and ability to communicate and influence effectively by presenting data in a compelling way  ? Incredibly strong skills to conceptualize experience within database relationships using diagrams and explain how databases interact with one another  ? Excellent cross-functional leadership; able to work independently, part of a team and interact professionally with the influence of all organizations  ? Preferred background in Python
